SELECT A.BOSS_METRIC_ID , A.BOSS_METRIC_NM , B.DETAIL_EVAL_ID , B.DETAIL_EVAL_NM , C.CONCEPT_ID , C.CONCEPT_NM , D.PLAN_ID , D.PLAN_NM , F_DEPT_FULL_NM(#findYear#, F.DEPT_ID, 'V_DEPTINFO') SC_DEPT_NM , F.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM , COUNT (1) OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, B.BOSS_METRIC_ID) AS BOSS_METRIC_CNT , ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, B.BOSS_METRIC_ID ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER, B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER, D.SORT_ORDER) AS BOSS_METRIC_INDEX , COUNT (1) OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, B.BOSS_METRIC_ID, C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID ) AS DETAIL_EVAL_CNT , ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, B.BOSS_METRIC_ID, C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER, B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER, D.SORT_ORDER) AS DETAIL_EVAL_INDEX , COUNT (1) OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, B.BOSS_METRIC_ID, C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID, D.CONCEPT_ID ) AS CONCEPT_CNT , ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, B.BOSS_METRIC_ID, C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID, D.CONCEPT_ID ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER, B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER, D.SORT_ORDER) AS CONCEPT_INDEX FROM BOSS_METRIC A INNER JOIN BOSS_DETAIL_EVAL_ITEM B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.BOSS_METRIC_ID = B.BOSS_METRIC_ID INNER JOIN BOSS_DETAIL_EVAL_CONCEPT C ON B.YEAR = C.YEAR AND B.DETAIL_EVAL_ID = C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID INNER JOIN BOSS_ACTION_PLAN D ON C.YEAR = D.YEAR AND C.CONCEPT_ID = D.CONCEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_USERINFO F ON B.INSERT_USER_ID = F.USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear#
A.DELETE_DT IS NULL
A.DELETE_DT IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER , B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER, D.SORT_ORDER

SELECT A.BOSS_METRIC_ID , A.BOSS_METRIC_NM , B.DETAIL_EVAL_ID , B.DETAIL_EVAL_NM , C.CONCEPT_ID , C.CONCEPT_NM , D.PLAN_ID , D.PLAN_NM , D.SORT_ORDER , F_DEPT_FULL_NM(#year#, F.DEPT_ID, 'V_DEPTINFO') SC_DEPT_NM , F.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM FROM BOSS_METRIC A INNER JOIN BOSS_DETAIL_EVAL_ITEM B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.BOSS_METRIC_ID = B.BOSS_METRIC_ID INNER JOIN BOSS_DETAIL_EVAL_CONCEPT C ON B.YEAR = C.YEAR AND B.DETAIL_EVAL_ID = C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BOSS_ACTION_PLAN D ON C.YEAR = D.YEAR AND C.CONCEPT_ID = D.CONCEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_USERINFO F ON B.INSERT_USER_ID = F.USER_ID WHERE D.YEAR = #year# AND D.PLAN_ID =#planId#
SELECT 'BP'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(PLAN_ID,3,6)),0)+1,5,'0') SEQ FROM BOSS_ACTION_PLAN WHERE YEAR = #year#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BOSS_ACTION_PLAN ( YEAR , PLAN_ID , CONCEPT_ID , PLAN_NM , SORT_ORDER , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #planId# , #conceptId# , #planNm# , #sortOrder# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BOSS_ACTION_PLAN SET PLAN_NM = #planNm# , SORT_ORDER = #sortOrder# WHERE YEAR = #year# AND PLAN_ID = #planId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BOSS_ACTION_PLAN WHERE YEAR = #year# AND PLAN_ID = #planId#
